answers.text:
Hi Jacob, 
Thank you for providing that great document! I'm sure it will be helpful to other local governments considering plastic bag taxes. While the Knowledge Network does not have anything on plastic bag taxes at this time I was able to find two documents about decreasing plastic bag usage through other methods. These programs would be a great compliment to a plastic bag tax program to further reduce bags used by the community. 
-This document "Bag central station-Where plastic bags belong" provides additional information that can be used to decrease the number of plastic bags used in your community icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/21035
-Learn more about Phoenix's film plastic bag recycling program http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/2698/City_of_Phoenixs_Film_Plastic_Bag_Recycling_Program
I hope you find these useful as you create your own comprehensive plastic bag reduction strategy and that any local government officials with bag tax programs in place chime in! 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org
